description: cfg-restore using payload Configuration. config download to the switch as payload  and perform config restore.
title: CfgRestorePayload

uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

is_forced_reboot_enabled.description: Apply the configuration with reboot if the configuration has reboot required commands.

is_recoverymode_enabled.description: To enable or disable recovery mode. Not applicable if is_forced_reboot_enabled is true.
